svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Improved water sources vs. GDP per capita, 2015
Share of the total population with access to improved water sources versus gross domestic product (GDP) per
capita, measured in 2011 international-$. The improved drinking water source includes piped water on premises
(piped household water connection located inside the userâ€™s dwelling, plot or yard), and other improved drinking
water sources (public taps or standpipes, tube wells or boreholes, protected dug wells, protected springs, and
Improved water source (% of population with access)
